Name: Too Much Water
About the game: Too Much Water is a top-down castaway simulator with an exquisite 'splash' of humour, and a captivating story. After a solar flare hits the Earth, the oceans flood, destroying cities and killing millions. Learn crafting recipes and discover new islands in order to survive the aquacalypse.
